  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.opends.server.api.OrderingMatchingRule
    since OPENDJ-1591 Migrate matching rules
    org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.ServerConnection
    will be removed as part of OPENDJ-3467. It has been replaced by ReactiveHandler<>
    org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.ServerConnectionFactory
    will be removed as part of OPENDJ-3467. It has been replaced by Function<LDAPClientContext, ReactiveHandler<>>.

    Method and Description
    org.opends.server.types.Entry.addAttribute(Attribute, List<ByteString>)
    org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.AttributeDescription.create(String, AttributeType)
    This method may be removed at any time

    This method may be removed at any time
    org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.AttributeDescription.create(String, AttributeType, String...)
    This method may be removed at any time
    org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.AttributeDescription.create(String, AttributeType, String)
    This method may be removed at any time
    org.opends.server.types.Entry.getAttribute(AttributeType)
    org.opends.server.types.Entry.getAttribute(AttributeType, boolean)
    org.opends.server.types.Entry.getAttribute(String)
    org.opends.server.types.Entry.getAttributes()
    org.opends.server.core.DirectoryServer.getConfigEntry(DN)
    use DirectoryServer.getEntry(DN) when possible
    org.opends.server.backends.ChangelogBackend.getInstance()
    instead inject the required object where needed
    org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.AttributeDescription.getNameOrOID()
    This method may be removed at any time
    org.opends.server.util.EmbeddedUtils.initializeForClientUse()
    Use EmbeddedDirectoryServer class instead
    org.opends.server.core.CoreConfigManager.isAllowAttributeNameExceptions()
    The schema option SchemaOptions.ALLOW_MALFORMED_NAMES_AND_OPTIONS from the schema should be used instead
    org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.schema.ObjectClass.isPlaceHolder()
    This method may be removed at any time
    org.opends.server.util.EmbeddedUtils.isRunning()
    Use EmbeddedDirectoryServer class instead
    org.opends.server.types.Entry.removeAttribute(Attribute, List<ByteString>)
    org.opends.server.util.EmbeddedUtils.restartServer(String, LocalizableMessage, DirectoryEnvironmentConfig)
    Use EmbeddedDirectoryServer class instead
    org.opends.server.util.EmbeddedUtils.startServer(DirectoryEnvironmentConfig)
    Use EmbeddedDirectoryServer class instead
    org.opends.server.util.EmbeddedUtils.stopServer(String, LocalizableMessage)
    Use EmbeddedDirectoryServer class instead
